item.description: ASL Interpreted Evening Performance Friday, October 7, 2011 at 8pm ASL Consultant: John Pirone ASL Interpreters: Cara Schwartz and Lucy Annett TICKETS are $15 for each Deaf or Hard-of-Hearing patron and one guest. For tickets, please contact Meg Wieder at 617 273 1558 voice, or by email at mwieder@huntingtontheatre.bu.edu. THIS IS THE MOST ACCLAIMED PRODUCTION OF CANDIDE IN YEARS!  WINNER OF 5 HELEN HAYES AWARDS INCLUDING BEST MUSICAL!! Featuring Leonard Bernstein's soaring score and lyrics from some of the wittiest writers of all time, this outrageous musical satire tells the story of the naive Candide and his absurd hardships that challenge his optimistic outlook on life and love. To learn more, check Huntingtontheatre.org/Candide!
item.name: Watch Candide--interpreted in ASL!
